text: Hi Anyone got any more information on the above CVE vulnerability? We have been asked to prioritise the patching/update for our Chrome and Edge browsers from my internal Cyber team. Not sure if anyone else is aware of this vulnerability and the risk level? I presume the severity level is critical, hence Cyber pushing it to apply as an urgent update. Thanks, Amag -- %40googlegroups.com
